Class DataPartitioner<T>

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.server.pipeline.DataPartitioner<T>
public class DataPartitioner<T> extends Object
Data Partitioner for distributing work across workers. Strategies: - Round-robin - Hash-based - Range-based - Custom partitioning
